panels.title: Decanter Kibana
panels.content:
### Welcome to Decanter. 

Decanter provides ready to use dashboards. You can change and update these dashboards to match your needs. 

 1. [Karaf](index.html#/dashboard/file/karaf.json) *Provide details about Karaf container* 
 2. [Camel](index.html#/dashboard/file/camel.json) *Provide details about Camel routes* 
 3. [ActiveMQ](index.html#/dashboard/file/activemq.json) *Provide details about ActiveMQ brokers* 
 4. [OperatingSystem](index.html#/dashboard/file/system.json) *Provide detail about Operating System using the system collector and system scripts* 

 You can also create your own dashboards from scratch, for monitoring of your own application, BAM, etc. 
 To do this, you can start from: 
 1. [Blank dashboard](index.html#/dashboard/file/blank.json) 
 2. [Simple dashboard](index.html#/dashboard/file/guided.json)
